channel.title: Comments on: Herb and Orange Chicken with Pineapple and Capsicum served with Pomegranate, Orange and Baby Spinach Salad

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: wow, those colours are just amazing. I'm sure I would NEVER get bored if I got salads like this. The textures would be pretty amazing too!!
item.content:encoded: wow, those colours are just amazing. I’m sure I would NEVER get bored if I got salads like this. The textures would be pretty amazing too!!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: The colors are phenomenal! And I'm sure it tastes wonderful! It gives me a glimpse of summer while we are in the middle of winter here.
item.content:encoded: The colors are phenomenal! And I’m sure it tastes wonderful! It gives me a glimpse of summer while we are in the middle of winter here.

item.title: By: Bake in Paris
item.dc:creator: Bake in Paris
item.description:
Besides being a wonderful salad, it is definitely a showcase of talent - a beautiful play of colors and a great blend of flavors.
Sawadee from bangkok, Kris
item.content:encoded:
Besides being a wonderful salad, it is definitely a showcase of talent – a beautiful play of colors and a great blend of flavors.

Sawadee from bangkok,
Kris

item.description: Here's to healthy and delicious salads. They look amazing!
item.content:encoded: Here’s to healthy and delicious salads. They look amazing!

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Oh Anita! The color of both dishes are just so inviting...the combination of ingredients are amazing...I absolutely love the sweetness of fruit in salad. Nice pictures :-)
item.content:encoded: Oh Anita! The color of both dishes are just so inviting…the combination of ingredients are amazing…I absolutely love the sweetness of fruit in salad. Nice pictures ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: I love the colours in this and aren't we supposed to eat really colourful food to get all of our vitamins? I can't think of a more pleasurable way to eat it than this! :D
item.content:encoded: I love the colours in this and aren’t we supposed to eat really colourful food to get all of our vitamins? I can’t think of a more pleasurable way to eat it than this! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Isabella
item.dc:creator: Isabella
item.description: That looks so delicious and healthy, I certainly could eat some of that!!
item.content:encoded: That looks so delicious and healthy, I certainly could eat some of that!!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I would love someone to place that plate in front of me! It's beaautiful. Those colors! There's nothing like fresh fruit and it's fun to use the pomegrante arils- such a burst of flavor as well as being pretty. Your chicken is flavored perfectly. This looks complicated, but when you read through, it really isn't! Super meal, Anita!
item.content:encoded:
I would love someone to place that plate in front of me! It’s beaautiful. Those colors! There’s nothing like fresh fruit and it’s fun to use the pomegrante arils- such a burst of flavor as well as being pretty.
Your chicken is flavored perfectly. This looks complicated, but when you read through, it really isn’t!
Super meal, Anita!
